transcript: Hi, this is Carlos Ruiz and I stop taking meth for me because it makes me dizzy

key_facts: Patient stopped taking meth due to side effects
result.safe_patient_reply: Thank you for sharing your concerns. Our pharmacist will review your medication list and get in touch with you soon. If symptoms worsen or you feel unsafe, please seek urgent care.

soap_note.subjective: Patient reported stopping meth due to side effects
soap_note.assessment: Patient stopped taking medication due to side effects

pharmacist_task.summary: Review patient's medication list after self-reported discontinuation of meth due to side effects.
